Package com.magnet.spi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExceptionObserver
    Called at various times during runtime to observe and respond to exception, usually by providing additional diagnostic information.
    InterceptorInvocationContext<T>
    Provides the necessary machinery to handle interception specific machinery.
    InvocationContext<T>
    Provides the necessary machinery to handle interception, decoration, validation and listening.
    LogicalConnector<T>
    An extension of ServiceConnector that can handle logical to physical mappings.
    PlatformProvider
    PlatformProviders represent services eligible to be driven by configuration.
    ProviderEvent
    The Event that corresponds to the invocation result, and/or any exceptions that were thrown along the way.
    ServiceConnector<T>
    Represents a generic Connector to an external system for some purpose.
    ServiceDecorator<T>
    Represents an Decorator.
    ServiceInterceptor<T>
    Marker interface for any Interceptor.
    ServiceListener<T>
    Represents an specific Listener.
    ServiceProvider
    Super contract for all Service Providers / Connectors.
    ServiceValidator<T>
    Represents an specific validator.
